Arvind and Partha Mukhopadhyay has been accepted at STOC, 2024. My paper Determinants vs. Algebraic Branching Programs with Mrinal Kumar and Ben Lee Volk has been accepted at ITCS, 2024. I have joined the Department of Computer Science and Engineering of Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur as an Assistant Professor on December 17, 2024. Served as one of the area chairs at ACM India ARCS 2025 Invited speaker for CALDAM 2025 Indo-Spain Pre-Conference School on Algorithms and Combinatorics during February 10-11, 2025.
